idea-plugin.name: ApiDocGenerate
idea-plugin.description:
API Doc Generate - Spring MVC API Documentation Generator

A powerful IntelliJ IDEA plugin designed for Spring MVC projects that automatically generates Markdown-formatted API documentation.


Key Features:

  • One-Click Generation - Right-click on a Controller class or method to quickly generate API documentation
  • Markdown Format - Generates standard Markdown format for easy integration with various documentation platforms
  • JSON Examples - Automatically generates request and response JSON examples with field comments
  • Git Integration - Automatically retrieves the current Git branch name
  • Live Preview - Real-time Markdown preview with light and dark themes
  • Flexible Export - Copy to clipboard or export to file
  • Field Exclusion - Configurable exclusion of specific classes or fields

Usage:

  1. Right-click on a Controller class or method and select "Generate API Doc"
  2. Or use the shortcut Alt+Home
  3. View, edit, and export documentation in the preview window
